__TOC__

When the development team was small enough, regular meetings were held on IRC with participation from all active developers.  Archives of those meetings can be found here.

Today, meetings are held among smaller teams.  A full calendar of meetings and other events can be found on the <nowiki>[[Fridge]]</nowiki>.
